page.title: 04Industry-Northbank Estate.
page.content: {Northbank}is the name of the site of the{old steel works}at the{Cadishead } entrance off the{A57}.This land adjacent to the M.S.C.has been redeveloped and a link road built to attract{new industry.} Since{1978,}with small initial government help,a{plastic moulding} {plant,}a{package printing}firm,small {engineering}firms plus some {warehousing and distribution} {storehouses}have occupied the site.Much remains{derelict.} New industry,especially much needed {labour intensive industry}is attracted to{Warrington New Town}plus the {Salford Docks Special Development } {Enterprise zone. } Plans have been proposed to develop the large remaining areas for{housing} and{recreation}rather than for {industry. }
